I would become Hermione Granger from the Harry Potter series. As a bookworm and lover of learning, I would relish the opportunity to explore the magical world of Hogwarts and use my intelligence to help solve problems and protect my friends.

I would become Elizabeth Bennet from Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. As a strong and independent woman, I would enjoy navigating the social dynamics of 19th century England and using my wit to challenge societal norms and expectations.
I would become Katniss Everdeen from Suzanne Collins' The Hunger Games. As a skilled hunter and survivor, I would relish the opportunity to fight for freedom and justice in a dystopian world.

I would become Atticus Finch from Harper Lee's To Kill a Mockingbird. As a wise and compassionate lawyer, I would enjoy using my legal knowledge to defend the innocent and fight for justice in a small southern town.

I would become Hermione Weasley from J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter series. As a resourceful and clever young woman, I would relish the opportunity to explore the magical world of Hogwarts and use my skills to help protect my friends and defeat the forces of darkness.
